save() - Static method in class main.java.il.ac.tau.cs.hanukcoin.block.LocalBlockChain

save() - Static method in class main.java.il.ac.tau.cs.hanukcoin.node.LocalNodeList
Saves LocalNodeList.localList to memory in the following format: for each node, at first will be 4 bytes describing its size, then 00000000 if old, 00000001 if new, and then the bytes corresponding to Node.getData()

startConnection(Node) - Method in class main.java.il.ac.tau.cs.server.Server.ClientConnection
Implementing the outgoing communication using Server.ClientConnection.sendRequest() if the returned message has new information we will update 3 random nodes from our LocalNodeList.localList using ServerActive.chooseAndSend() if the node is new and we didn't manage to get a response we are incrementing the tries counter
